participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about sustainability, with a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I still have my stuffed bunny from childhood, even though I'm 30. I am committed to the environment. My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion. I work in construction. I like to make clothes.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, balancing responsibilities with a playful, geeky side.
participant_2.background: I'm always looking for ways to balance my geeky side with my responsibilities. I am married with 2 children. I like to snuggle up with my kids and read them stories while it rains. My parents passed away in a car accident. I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.

content.text: Hey, I love fashion and game shows too! What are your favorite games?
I love Jeopardy, especially when I'm playing along with my kids. I also like Wheel of Fortune.
Me too! I also love the Price is Right. Do you like to make clothes?
I've never tried, but I've always wanted to. I'm pretty good at sewing.
I'm actually trying to learn how to make clothes. I'm a big fan of sustainable fashion.
That's awesome! I'm trying to be more eco-friendly too. I've started composting and recycling.
That's great! I've been doing that for a while. I also try to buy local produce and avoid plastic.
Me too! I'm trying to be more conscious of my impact on the environment.
It's great to meet someone who shares my interests.
Me too! I feel like I've been talking to myself this whole time.
Haha, I know what you mean. It's rare to meet someone who shares all of my interests.
I feel like we're going to be friends.
Me too! I'd love to hang out sometime and talk more about fashion and game shows.
Sounds great! I'm free this weekend.
Perfect! I'll text you my number
